description: This file is a C header (.h) that declares the interface functions and some related constants for the CCSP Message Bus Service in the context of the CCSP Secure Software Download environment. It includes function prototypes for engaging with the message bus, initialization, finalization, health checks, resource management, and signaling, as well as DBus message handling and registration functions.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the system with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up resources with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check of the bus status with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees allocated resources based on priority and user data.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a change in parameter value.

methods.name: CcspTandD_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages on a given connection.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the component to the configuration registry.

methods.name: ssp_TadMbi_WaitConditionReady
methods.description: Waits until a bus condition is ready, given component IDs and DBus path.
